channel.title: FreedomScape | Join Now | New | 317 | Customs | Lots of Freedom | Free Items
channel.description:
[b]Easy Way To Start - Download Client and Login:[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/a3x1g9nptpbefvh/FreedomScape_Client_Updated.zip]Click Here[/url]
OR:
[ul][center][b]SERVER: ONLINE[/b] Players Needed, Just started re-hosting. [size=16pt]Drop Party When There Is 15 Players Online.[/size] Triple XP than usual, Special Starter Package. Hurry. [b]Players Needed, Just started re-hosting.[/b] Invite Friends, Lets Get This Server Going. [/center]
Hello Guys and Gals, this is Tyler.
I'm here to inform you that I have a RSPS, that is back online. Some people may know of it, but many may not. The Server is called FreedomScape. FreedomScape is the newest server name, it was changed due to the last server name, not many liked so I changed it. So for those that it concerned. But FreedomScape is a RuneScape Private Server. Back in the day it wasn't as popular to many people. But as you may know, RitzScape, it is similar to RitzScape but it has my own updates and some extra stuff. Not to make to could amazing or anything, but it is a really good server. I have had people online doing beta testing and such. Most bugs have been fixed. Some suggestions have been accepted, still being accepted.
FreedomScape is just a little server to play in your free time, enjoy the game, and meet new people.
-------------------------------
Features:
• Training Areas • Many Locations • Good Community • Great Economy • Lots of Freedom • New Home • Quick Chat Skills • Coin Credits • Colored Wings • Custom Weapons • Custom Equipment • 99 Skill Level ( Can Buy Trimmed Capes ) • 135 Max Skill Level ( Can Buy Untrimmed Capes ) • ::talking ( Uses 2 coin credits and can talk to the world ) • Lots of commands for players ( Type ::commands ) • Bosses ( Armadyl , Bandos , Zamorak , & Saradomin ) @ ::monsters or Click 'Monster Portals' In Quest Tab. • Metal Dragons ( Drops ) @ Click 'Monster Portals' In Quest Tab. • Colored Dragons ( Drops ) @ Click 'Monster Portals' In Quest Tab. • & Much More
-------------------------------
Pictures:
[img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200000.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200001.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200002.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200003.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200004.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200005.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200006.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200007.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200008.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200009.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200010.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200011.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200012.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200013.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200014.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200015.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200016.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200017.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200018.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200019.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200021.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200022.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200023.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200024.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200026.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200027.png[/img]
-------------------------------
Why you should play this server?
I'm not telling you to play this server, I'm just suggesting it. It is totally up to you. All i recommend is that you give it a try, better to try and not like it than to not know if you like it or not. Up to you. If so read the section below. Maybe I'll see you around.
-------------------------------
Go to the website that will be located below this paragraph, Sign up and become a member so I have an estimate of players that would to be apart of the community. At the website below you will be able to get a lot of updates and information.
Website: [url=http://www.freedomscape.x10host.com/]http://www.freedomscape.x10host.com/[/url] ( New Website, Don't Judge lol. )
Client Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/a3x1g9nptpbefvh/FreedomScape_Client_Updated.zip]FreedomScape Client[/url] ( Newest / No Problems ) Thanks to CernodileHD Have proeblems, send me an email @ [email]typrizza@live.com[/email] -------------------------------
Thank you all for taking the time to go through this. I hope some of you were interested. If not I'm sorry, I'm sure there is a rsps out there that will fit you.
Have fun and Enjoy the community.[/ul]

item.title: FreedomScape | Join Now | New | 317 | Customs | Lots of Freedom | Free Items
item.dc:creator: @TyPrizza TyPrizza
item.description:
@TyPrizza wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:38, topic:545958”][quote author=wimstr link=topic=664848.msg4446076#msg4446076 date=1408872610]

Funny how i installed JRE 8, yet still the same error.
Would be cool to play, but this client sucks.

New client is no difference either.
error error error

Install JRE 7… -_-

cough i have both…
And i needed JRE 8 claimed by you if it says version 52.0, which it is for me.
[/quote]
Make sure your paths are updated. Sometimes installing a new Java version won’t be seen until you restart your computer.
Don’t forget to update your environmental variables (if you have them). If you don’t know what I’m talking about, chances are you don’t have to worry about it.
If you still have issues even after all this, message me and I’ll try and get it sorted for you.[/quote]

Problems Fixed. Thanks for the Help tho.

Read full topic
item.source: FreedomScape | Join Now | New | 317 | Customs | Lots of Freedom | Free Items

item.title: FreedomScape | Join Now | New | 317 | Customs | Lots of Freedom | Free Items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:36, topic:545958”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=664848.msg4446074#msg4446074 date=1408872283]

Funny how i installed JRE 8, yet still the same error.
Would be cool to play, but this client sucks.

New client is no difference either.
error error error

Install JRE 7… -_-
[/quote]

cough i have both…
And i needed JRE 8 claimed by you if it says version 52.0, which it is for me.[/quote]
Make sure your paths are updated. Sometimes installing a new Java version won’t be seen until you restart your computer.
Don’t forget to update your environmental variables (if you have them). If you don’t know what I’m talking about, chances are you don’t have to worry about it.
If you still have issues even after all this, message me and I’ll try and get it sorted for you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m just going to put this out there:

Unsupported major.minor version [b]51.0[/b]
means you need [url=http://java.com/en/]JRE 7[/url].
Unsupported major.minor version [b]52.0[/b]
means you need [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre8-downloads-2133155.html]JRE 8[/url].

item.title: FreedomScape | Join Now | New | 317 | Customs | Lots of Freedom | Free Items
item.dc:creator: @TyPrizza TyPrizza
item.description:
@TyPrizza wrote:

[code]Client problems:

If you get something like this when you run the client:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknow n Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

All you have to do is download the latest version of Java,
because it uses the latest version I have used.
https://jdk8.java.net/download.html The JDK Version.
If have problems just send me a message to my email:[/code]

Advertisement Updated. That Shall Solve Client Problems.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PvPKid0rg PvPKid0rg
item.description:
@PvPKid0rg wrote:

[quote=“TyPrizza, post:27, topic:545958”][quote author=wimstr link=topic=664848.msg4445977#msg4445977 date=1408829736]
Tried to compile, said it couldn’t find the path.
Launcher still giving that error, Java is up to date.

[/quote]

[quote author=PvPKid0rg link=topic=664848.msg4445981#msg4445981 date=1408831057]

Tried to compile, said it couldn’t find the path.
Launcher still giving that error, Java is up to date.
[/quote]This ^^

Try editing your Launcher to this:

@echo off title FreedomScape v.5 client is running... java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar client pause
Still nothing…

Then get back to me.[/quote]

Read full topic
